psychological_characteristics.control_needs: High – need to exert control over victims.
psychological_characteristics.social_competence: May appear normal initially; can be charming but lacks genuine empathy.
psychological_characteristics.fantasy_elements: Sadistic fantasies involving domination, control, and degradation.

behavioral_characteristics.crime_scene_behavior: Moderately organized – some planning (ligature, transport of body), but also impulsive actions (leaving purse and ID).
behavioral_characteristics.violence_type: Violent and brutal, indicative of anger and a desire to inflict pain.
behavioral_characteristics.victim_interaction: Domination and control – inflicting physical harm and leaving a symbolic arrangement of the body.
behavioral_characteristics.post_offense_behavior: Attempts to conceal evidence (covering body, cleaning car) and distance himself from the crime scene.
behavioral_characteristics.risk_taking: Moderate - attempts concealment but makes some mistakes.
behavioral_characteristics.trophy_taking: Possible – hairs found on victim not matching victim.
reasoning: Attempt to hide the body suggests organisation
Leaving of ID and purse suggests outburst or oversight
Cleaning vehicle suggests taking action to conceal.

geographic_behavior.crime_scene_location: Remote wooded area, 2.3 miles from recreation area.
geographic_behavior.crime_scene_layout: Small ravine, not visible from trails – suggesting prior knowledge of the area.
geographic_behavior.crime_scene_characteristics: Secluded location, used for disposing of the body in an attempt to conceal the crime.
reasoning: Remote location suggests an effort to avoid detection.
Knowledge of the ravine's location indicates familiarity with the area.
Disposal site consistent with covering up the crime

Attempted cleanup indicates awareness of evidence.

Average appearance aids in blending in and avoiding suspicion.
Isolated lifestyle could contribute to distorted thinking.
The victimology suggests a specific target selection.
The remote location and attempts at concealment indicate planning.
The violence and sexual assault suggest underlying psychological issues related to control and domination.
